tool_description: Integrates product costs, operational expenses, and pricing-related investments to support comprehensive ROI analysis.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs for cost data integration

cost_period_start.description: Start date for cost data collection

cost_period_end.description: End date for cost data collection

include_fixed_costs.description: Whether to include allocated fixed costs

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Products not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the cost database.
Missing cost data: Cost information is not available for some products in the specified period.
Cost data inconsistency: Detected inconsistencies in cost data that may affect accuracy.
usage: Provide product_ids list and date range for cost data collection. Set include_fixed_costs to true for comprehensive cost analysis including overhead allocation.

total_variable_costs.description: Sum of variable costs for all products

average_cost_per_unit.description: Average cost per unit across all products

cost_integration_summary.description: Summary of integrated cost data and methodology
